data.title: Karina
authors: Contributors to The Fresh Beat Band Wiki
data.meta_description: According to Eddie Murphy, Axel Foley needed to grow up for a fourth Beverly Hills Cop movie.
data.text:
Karina (K/iki and M/arina) is the friendship pairing between Kiki and Marina.

Kiki and Marina are best friends. Out of all of the Fresh Beats, Kiki is closest with Marina, and the feeling is mutual. They have been friends since elementary school. When Marina was at recess all alone with no friends, Kiki was the first person who talked to her. The girls are usually paired up together whenever the Fresh Beats are split up or not altogether. In most of the songs, they usually sing some duet parts as well. They usually give slight compliments to each other, and don't seem to have any problem with one another.

Stick Together[]

Marina is the first person whom Kiki calls on the phone.

While the girls were on the phone and Kiki blows the noisemaker, Marina is shocked by the sound, but then laughs. Suggesting that she enjoys, yet is sometimes surprised by, Kiki's upbeat energy.

On the phone, while Kiki and Marina are both calling Twist, after Twist says, "and I'm ready to go, go, go," they both laugh.

When Twist gets his foot stuck in the bucket, Marina leans very close towards Kiki.

When Twist asked if anyone has seen the brushes, Kiki and Marina both in unison say, "We've seen them!".

When Twist asks where the brushes were, Kiki and Marina both respond saying, "In your pockets.".

When the Fresh Beats enter Music School and Marina pauses to look at the drums, Kiki asks, "Is something wrong, Marina?".

When Kiki and Twist were stuck together, Marina tried to pull Kiki to get her unstuck.

When the Fresh Beats lined up to take the wrapping paper off of Ms. Piccolo's hand, Kiki holds on to Marina's waist.

Stomp the House[]

When Marina wakes the Fresh Beats up, Kiki at first looks mad at her. In the next shot, however, Kiki looks sadder.

Whenever there were boxes that include all four Fresh Beats in "Let's Play", Kiki and Marina's boxes were both together. Whether they were together diagonally or horizontally.

While Marina was practicing her drums for the song, Kiki encouraged her by saying, "You go, girl!".

Presto Pants[]

Kiki and Marina both made a basket in basketball.

Kiki compliments Marina's basket.

Marina compliments Kiki's basket.

Marina and Kiki high fived each other and intertwined fingers.

Mixed Up Musical[]

Kiki's and Marina's clothes got mixed up.

Kiki and Marina were both dancing behind Twist and Shout.

Kiki was smiling at Marina while she was singing.

Marina is surprised when Kiki was playing with her drumsticks.

Kiki returned Marina's dress.

Marina returned Kiki's jacket.

Band in a Jam[]

Kiki is the first-person Marina ever met.

Zydeco Music Parade[]

Marina and Kiki took the car with the float stuff over to the parade while the boys rode with Reed with the instruments.

Marina got a fiddle and violin bow for Kiki while Kiki borrowed a snare drum, hi-hat cymbal and drumsticks for Marina, and they say “Aw!” when they brought it to each other.

Marina and Kiki both find the rest of the replacement instruments for the parade while the boys are trying to get there.

The Wizard of Song[]

Marina thought of Kiki when Tin Woman said "Kicking".

Kiki (and the Fresh Beat boys) started getting really worried about Marina.

When The Wizard showed a video of Kiki (and the Fresh Beat boys) Kiki was wondering where Marina was.

When Marina realized that her adventure was a dream, Kiki nodded as if to say that Marina was always imagining things like that.

When Marina promised that she'll never take off during rehearsal again, Kiki smiled at her.

Kiki complimented Marina's Sparkly Dancing Shoes. Then she looks at Marina with her mouth hanging open in amazement.

Dance Floor Superhero[]

When Marina says, "Bad guys, be ready for the super Rock Steady!", Kiki smiles at her.

Marina compliments Kiki's high singing.

Kiki thanks Marina for the compliment and gently touches Marina's tummy with her fist.

Kiki calls Marina "Rock Steady".

When Kiki calls Marina "Rock Steady", the two girls smile and rub elbows.

When Shout goes over to Melody to make a funny face, Marina peers over Kiki's shoulder.

As Marina uses a hairdryer to warm up Harper, Kiki helps her by using a bigger hairdryer.

When Marina courageously volunteers to stop Deep Freeze first, Kiki pats her back a bit.

When Marina uses her drumsticks to try and stop Deep Freeze, Kiki smiles at her, but her smile drops when Deep Freeze laughs at Marina.

Rock Star[]

When Marina is singing and dancing to Just Like A Rock Star, Kiki (along with Twist) walks in on her and giggles.

When the Fresh Beats are playing Rock Star, Kiki lands on blue, one of Marina's favorite colors.

When Kiki played the London bridge riff in the Rock Star game, she sang the last line, "My fair lady!", possibly referring to Marina.

When the Fresh Beats are in the Rock Star game world and it's Marina's turn, Kiki pats her back.

Kiki and Marina are seen standing next to each other on the giant keyboard.

When Marina gets the Rock Star round in the game world, Kiki excitedly takes Marina's hand.

When Marina successfully wins the game, Kiki hugs Marina for a couple of seconds.

Kiki (along with Shout and Harper) is surprised that Marina had sorted all of Shout's socks.

Chimps In Charge[]

Kiki and Marina look after a girl chimp named Bingo.

While looking for Bingo, Kiki and Marina dance and sing a line from the song "B-I-N-G-O".

Look closely: Before Kiki and Marina high-five each other, Kiki gently taps Marina's nose.

Both girls go to Kiki's apartment to find Bingo.

Kiki and Marina get Bingo ready for a nap but get distracted when they find her wearing Kiki's pink clothes.

Kiki and Marina dress Bingo up in Kiki's clothes and end up getting tired themselves.

Kiki and Marina are seen sleeping next to each other on Kiki's bed.

The girls wake up and ask each other "Where's Bingo?"

When Marina suggests the Fresh Beats build a jungle gym, Kiki touches an end of Marina's hair.

Royal Wedding[]

Kiki and Marina look at the Princess' things. Kiki looks at the glass slippers, and Marina is seen wearing one of the Princess's tiaras.

As the Princess thanks the girls for helping with her stuff, Kiki tosses the slipper behind her, and Marina catches it before it breaks.

Kiki helps Marina take off the tiara.

The girls tried to get the Princess back together with the Prince.

The girls wear royal hats to the royal wedding.

During the song Another Perfect Day, Kiki and Marina exchange flowers for their decorations.

Ghost Band[]

When Kiki asks "Guys, do you think it could be the ghosts?", she moves closer to Marina and puts her arm around her.

Kiki is very unhappy when a ghost showers Marina with flour, and she angrily tells this prankster how rude he is.

Kiki and Marina are seen cleaning the flour off each other's faces. Marina cleans the flour off Kiki's cheek while Kiki does the same around Marina's eyes.

When the girls clean up each other's faces, Marina closes her eyes and shows a giggly facial expression as if Kiki was tickling her.

Kiki is shocked when Marina panics about being locked in the prison. She and Twist rub Marina's back and calm her down.

Kiki happily watches Marina tap-dancing with the female ghost during the concert.

Dance-A-Thon[]

When Kiki tells Marina that she could win, she has her hand on Marina's shoulder.

The girls stay very close together until Shout comes in between them. However, Kiki still has her arm around Marina.

Kiki mistakes Marina's running and wiggling for dance moves when Marina runs and wiggles all over the cafe after dropping an ice cube in her dress.

Kiki is shocked when Marina runs and wiggles to get the ice cube out of her dress.

Marina gives Kiki a shoulder massage to help her keep dancing.

Graduation Day[]

When Kiki and (the Fresh Beat Boys) stop Marina from playing the graduation song rapidly, Kiki reminds her that the speed of the music should be fast but not very fast.

Kiki suggests Marina be a construction worker.

Kiki is shocked when Marina falls off the jackhammer.

When Marina almost gets hurt from using the jackhammer, Kiki apologizes for suggesting something dangerous.

When Marina thanks her friends for offering to help her decide what she wants to be, Kiki happily replies with, "Sure! I mean that's why you've got friends like us!", and she smiles at her.

After the song A Friend Like You, Kiki asks Marina what she thought.

Trivia[]

Kiki's and Marina's rooms are right next to each other.

Kiki and Marina are around the same height. Marina is considered the shortest member of the band although Kiki isn't much taller than her. Kiki may have gotten a little taller in Season 3.

At the end of the Another Perfect Day dance, Kiki usually puts her arm on Marina's shoulder.

Kiki and Marina are opposite in terms of personality. Kiki and Marina are girly girls and tomboys, respectively.
